articles.description: Brent Taylor, the mayor of North Ogden, Utah, and an energetic and beloved figure in Utah politics, was killed Saturday in an incident in Afghanistan, where he was serving as a member of the state National Guard.
articles.content: (CNN) Brent Taylor, the mayor of North Ogden, Utah, and an energetic and beloved figure in Utah politics, was killed Saturday in an incident in Afghanistan, where he was serving as a member of the state National Guard. The unexpected death of Taylor, who was … [+3647 chars]

articles.author: AnneClaire Stapleton and Steve Almasy, CNN
articles.title: 4 people killed when truck hits Girl Scout troop
articles.description: Three girls and a woman were killed Saturday morning when a truck driven by a Wisconsin man struck them as their Girl Scout troop was picking up trash along a roadway.

articles.title: Mayor Andrew Gillum addresses Tallahassee shooting
articles.description: Democratic nominee for Florida governor Andrew Gillum addressed the shooting that took place at a yoga studio in Tallahassee, Florida.

articles.author: Nadia Kounang, CNN
articles.title: Why some people get CTE may be in their genes
articles.description: Scientists have zeroed in our genetic code to better determine why some people develop CTE. A new study, finds that a variant of the gene TMEM106B may influence why some people experience more severe forms of the disease than others.
articles.content: (CNN) Scientists have zeroed in our genetic code to better determine why some people develop chronic traumatic encephalopathy, the Alzheimer's-like disease associated with repeated hits to the head. In a new study, researchers at Boston University's CTE Cente… [+5324 chars]

articles.author: AngelaBonachera
articles.title: Conmebol confirma a River Plate como finalista de la Copa Libertadores y se enfrentará a Boca Juniors
articles.description: El entrenador no estará en la final de la Copa Libertadores contra Boca Juniors por haber sido sancionado.

articles.title: Utah mayor killed in Afghanistan
articles.description: Brent Taylor, who temporarily stepped down as North Ogden mayor to deploy to Afghanistan with the Utah Army National Guard, died in Afghanistan, officials said.

articles.author: Serenitie Wang, CNN
articles.title: China's middle class: We're being picked like leeks by the government
articles.description:
Suggest we lose references to rising cost of living, CPI figure given here is year-on-year (there's also a MoM release), and annual inflation of 2.5% is pretty low. Focus on rents and stocks instead?

Spike Wang, a 29-year-old financial professional based in …
articles.content: Beijing, CNN (CNN) Spike Wang, a 29-year-old financial professional based in Shanghai, is struggling to live the Chinese dream. Wang is one of millions of Chinese middle-class men and women who grew up in a roaring economy. Now, amid soaring rents and a plung… [+6548 chars]

articles.author: Amir Vera, Jennifer Hauser and Alla Eshchenko, CNN
articles.title: Selfie attempt results in damage to artwork by Salvador Dali and Francisco Goya
articles.description: A woman at an art museum in Yekaterinburg, Russia, tried to take a selfie on October 27 and accidentally knocked over a structure carrying two works of art.

articles.author: Jason Hanna, CNN
articles.title: 'Whitey' Bulger was prison's 3rd slain inmate this year, and lawmakers were warning about its violence
articles.description: Just days before former Boston mob boss James "Whitey" Bulger was brutally beaten to death at a federal prison in West Virginia, politicians and even prisoners themselves were sounding a warning: There is far too much violence there.
